snippet.title: Battle Chasers: Nightwar - Mobile Edition // Official Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
#BattleChasers #BCNW #Comic #JRPG

Battle Chasers: Nightwar - Mobile Edition is an RPG inspired by the classic console greats, featuring deep dungeon diving, turn-based combat presented in a classic JRPG format, and a rich story driven by exploration of the world. No Ads, Lootboxes, or IAP!

Grab the premium version here:
Android: http://bit.ly/BattleChasersA
iOS: http://bit.ly/BattleChasersB

#AirshipSyndicate #HandyGames

Sound design by Jürgen Zimmermann and Christophe Kalkau.

by http://www.handy-games.com. ▶

Join us on Facebook: http://www.fb.com/handygames
Follow us on Instagram: http://instagram.com/handygames
Check news on Twitter: http://www.twitter.com/handy_games
Subscribe to our YouTube channel: http://goo.gl/2Kq6yY

Battle Chasers: Nightwar was originally developed by Airship Syndicate.
https://twitter.com/Battle_Chasers
https://twitter.com/AirshipSyn
https://www.facebook.com/airshipsyndicate/
